features: CAR INTERIOR DUST REMOVER- No more dusty dashboard, driving in traffic is bad enough. You shouldn’t also have to worry about how dirty your car dashboard looks on the way to pick up a date! Grab one of our dusters out of your glovebox and wipe it clean!

PERFECTLY SIZED CAR INTERIOR BRUSH - The main problem with some car detail brush is that they are too big to be used in many places. Our mini car dust cleaner with 10” dusting head is big enough to get your dash dust-free quickly but small enough to leave in your glove box. The perfect size for almost any place that needs dusting!

SAVE TIME AND SHINE WITH OUR DETAILING DUSTER- You won’t have to worry about a bucket full of interior car wash supplies to clean the dash. This small car duster can replace all the sprays, wipes, and napkins all in just 10”. No more car wipes to dry up!

DASH CARE, THE BEST CAR DASHBOARD CLEANER ON AMAZON - Great for interior car detail or exterior use! Automobile, Motorcycle, RV or Home! The electrostatic microfiber chenille makes sure dust doesn't get left behind no matter where you are!
90 DAY SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – If for some reason you are not satisfied with our brush car interior, we will return your money with no questions asked.

Safe on paint and other delicate surfaces! Car, Truck, Motorcycle, Home or RV, you can trust your finish to Relentless Drive. Microfiber Mesh Easily removes stubborn dirt 10" Dust Head Fits perfectly in your glove box Ultra-Thick Microfiber Strands Traps dust and dirt
Stay dust-free in your car or around the house

Ultimate Car Duster Ultimate XL Microfiber Towels with Shammy Ultimate Microfiber Car Wash Sponge Ultimate Carpet and Upholstry Brush Ultimate Plush Microfiber Car Drying Towel Premium Features 360° of thick electostatic microfiber and over 2ft of reach XL, ultra absorbant microfiber Absorbant, thick microfiber and bug erasing mesh Premium soft-touch grip and chemical resistant nylon bristles Thick, plush double-sided microfiber with finished edges Material Electrostatic microfiber chenille Ultra-soft, premium microfiber Thick microfiber chenille and microfiber mesh Premium PVC and Nylon Plush microfiber Size 16"x6" x 360° 24" x 60" 4" x 9.5" 7" x 4" 15" x 17" Quantity 1 3 towels, 1 shammy 2 1 3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits in the car door so always handy for a quick dusting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best duster ever!
reviews.reviewText: I love the shape, the fabric, the quality, the color, the performance, the handle…basically everything about it! I’ve used this to dust my house, including windows, mirrors, TV, TV stands, bookshelves, nightstands, dresser drawers, pretty much almost everything. I didn’t have to clean the duster and I didn’t noticed any dust left behind. I even use this to dust in my car and I actually keep one in the car. The quality is holding up very well and I can see this lasting for a very long time. They just need to make a slimmer and flexible duster to get into the tight crevices and grooves. This is still perfect and I highly recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate dash duster/Relentless Drive
reviews.reviewText: Product good quality. Study handle, compact. Picks up dust effectively. No case for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean the dash quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: All I can say, is it cleans my car. I do construction so it’s fair to say my car gets dusty on a regular. It picks up all the heavy dust, you can also dampen it to clean. What I really liked about the product was the fact that it could be washed versus having to buy refillable pieces to clean dust. I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car stays clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works everywhere except the dash
reviews.reviewText: This duster is conveniently sized and well made with a solid handle and plenty of surface area to pick up dust. The microfiber bristles work quite well picking up dust and small crumbs on the seats, center console, steering column, and front panel of the dashboard. However, when I tried using it on the top of the dashboard where most of the dust collects, so much static built up between the fibers and the dashboard that the duster left more little fibers on the dash than it picked up dust. The black dash looked considerably worse than when I first started and the fibers clinged so tightly to the dashboard that I had to use a wipe to get them off. I should add that I have a fairly new car so I don't know if this problem will get better with time but for now I am only using the duster on the seats, center console, steering column, and front panel of the dashboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am enjoying this product, especially since i can't reach half of my dashboard to remove dust and pet hair without it.

Maybe this will work if you have super smooth surfaces with no texture...like a piano.But this product leaves lint. Constantly.Don't believe the exaggerated reviews and avoid wasting $30 on this.I guess I can give it 1 star for being a good size.
